Detailed Description

Parameters of APSME-REMOVE-DEVICE.request primitive.

See ZigBee Specification r19, Table 4.22, page 463.

Definition at line 73 of file apsmeRemoveDevice.h.

Field Documentation

ExtAddr_t APS_RemoveDeviceReq_t::parentAddress

[LE] The extended 64-bit address of the device that is the parent of the child device that is requested to be removed.

Definition at line 85 of file apsmeRemoveDevice.h.

ExtAddr_t APS_RemoveDeviceReq_t::childAddress

[LE] The extended 64-bit address of the child device that is requested to be removed.
